title: Disco Ball
summaries: The Disco Ball is a novelty Hardmode light source that can be placed on the underside of blocks, generating short pulses of colored light that cycle through the spectrum (In the Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, the Disco Ball will cycle through red, green, and blue only). The light can be toggled with wires. It is purchased from the Merchant in Hardmode for 1 each.
